grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 偽証【ギショウ】false evidence, perjury, false testimony
真偽【シンギ】truth or error, authenticity, veracity
kun reading compounds: 偽る【いつわる】to lie, to cheat, to pretend, to feign, to falsify, to trick, to deceive
偽【にせ】imitation, fake, phony, counterfeit, forged, bogus, sham, pseudo-
偽物【にせもの】spurious article, forgery, counterfeit, imitation, sham
偽り【いつわり】lie, falsehood, fiction, fabrication
偽り語る【いつわりかたる】to speak falsely
